memberdef.name: mpi_world_rank

detaileddescription.para: Functions for handling MPI parallelization: initializing buffers, distributing results between MPI processes etc.

memberdef.referencedby: dataBuffer< Q, k, rank, numberFrequencyDims, pos_first_freqpoint, frequencyGrid_type, inter, >::optimize_grid

detaileddescription.para:
initialize buffer into which each MPI process can write
Q
: result data type (comp or double)
n_mpi
: # of MPI tasks (# of grid points for external variable(s) in which we do MPI parallelization)
n_omp
: # of OMP tasks (# of grid points for external variable(s) in which we do OMP parallelization)
vec<Q> : empty buffer vector with length corresponding to total number of tasks that the current process will compute

initialize result buffer into which results of all MPI processes are collected
Q
: result data type (comp or double)
n_mpi
: # of MPI tasks (# of grid points for external variable(s) in which we do MPI parallelization)
n_omp
: # of OMP tasks (# of grid points for external variable(s) in which we do OMP parallelization)
vec<Q> : empty result buffer vector with length corresponding to the sum of total numbers of tasks for all current processes

memberdef.argsstring: (vec< comp > &buffer, vec< comp > &result, int n_mpi, int n_omp)
memberdef.name: mpi_collect

detaileddescription.para:
distribute results between all MPI processes, using MPI_Allgather (for data type comp)
buffer
: buffer vector containing the results of the current process
result
: buffer vector in which the results of all processes are written
n_mpi
: # of MPI tasks (# of grid points for external variable(s) in which we do MPI parallelization)
n_omp
: # of OMP tasks (# of grid points for external variable(s) in which we do OMP parallelization)

memberdef.referencedby: BubbleFunctionCalculator< channel, Q, vertexType_result, vertexType_left, vertexType_right, Bubble_Object >::calculate_bubble_function

memberdef.argsstring: (vec< double > &buffer, vec< double > &result, int n_mpi, int n_omp)
